title: I Jan Baalsruds fotspor
overview: Special soldiers Ronny Bratli and Rune Gjeldnes relive the incredible escape story of Jan Baalsrud through North Troms. After the war, the Linge soldier became world famous through the book and film Ni Liv. The escape starts in Toftefjord when a German warship attacks the fishing boat with the sabotage group. Rune and Ronny have to go through the same icy ordeals that Baalsrud barely survived.Â
